main event: Observers watched 3 lights that appeared similar in size to aircraft lights moving in various directions in Findlay, Ohio.
interesting points: The lights appeared red and at times increased to about 5 in number,The observer stopped observing because yard lights interfered with visibility,The behavior and movement of the lights were inconsistent with conventional aircraft,The total observation duration was about 15 minutes,The witness described the object as bright and silvery in appearance.
sighted object: three red lights in the sky
